patch 8.2.2097: Vim9: using :silent! when calling a function prevents abort

Problem:    Vim9: using :silent! when calling a function prevents abortng that
            function.
Solution:   Add emsg_silent_def and did_emsg_def.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2097: Vim9: using :silent! when calling a function prevents… · vim/vim@56602ba
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2097: Vim9: using :silent! when calling a function prevents… · vim/vim@56602ba
attachments.text: … abort Problem: Vim9: using :silent! when calling a function prevents abortng that function. Solution: Add emsg_silent_def and did_emsg_def.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f665e97ffa06817975810cb511b13dbaa83ec630|patch 8.2.2096: Vim9: command modifiers not restored after assignment>
patch 8.2.2096: Vim9: command modifiers not restored after assignment

Problem:    Vim9: command modifiers not restored after assignment.
Solution:   Jump to nextline instead of using continue.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2096: Vim9: command modifiers not restored after assignment · vim/vim@f665e97
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2096: Vim9: command modifiers not restored after assignment · vim/vim@f665e97
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: command modifiers not restored after assignment. Solution: Jump to nextline instead of using continue.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4029cabbe7c68a304ab8becb495bd6d91c6e97b1|patch 8.2.2095: Vim9: crash when failed dict member is followed by co…>
patch 8.2.2095: Vim9: crash when failed dict member is followed by concat

Problem:    Vim9: crash when failed dict member is followed by concatenation.
Solution:   Remove the dict from the stack. (closes #7416)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2095: Vim9: crash when failed dict member is followed by co… · vim/vim@4029cab
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2095: Vim9: crash when failed dict member is followed by co… · vim/vim@4029cab
attachments.text: …ncat Problem: Vim9: crash when failed dict member is followed by concatenation. Solution: Remove the dict from the stack. (closes #7416)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d0fe620cbbf5f5e00446efa89893036265c5c302|patch 8.2.2094: when an expression fails getting next command may be …>
patch 8.2.2094: when an expression fails getting next command may be wrong

Problem:    When an expression fails getting the next command may be wrong.
Solution:   Do not check for a next command after :eval fails. (closes #7415)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2094: when an expression fails getting next command may be … · vim/vim@d0fe620
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2094: when an expression fails getting next command may be … · vim/vim@d0fe620
attachments.text: …wrong Problem: When an expression fails getting the next command may be wrong. Solution: Do not check for a next command after :eval fails. (closes #7415)
